mapper.insert: INSERT INTO links (long_url, long_url_hash, expires_at) VALUES (#{longUrl}, #{longUrlHash}, #{expiresAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE links SET short_code = #{shortCode} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, long_url, short_code, created_at, expires_at FROM links WHERE long_url_hash = #{longUrlHash} AND expires_at > NOW()
